entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
